name: Blade of the Netherworld
description:
Game Features:

Under the reign title of Ruixiang 3rd, the world is full of disaster and madness. In these days, demons and monsters endanger the earthly, heaven and hell.
Stand your ground you never give in. But you lost and it's drives you insan. Seeing that you are so obsessed, Yama made a deal with you: as long as you are willing to kill the demons and ghosts for Yama in the netherworld, he will give you the power to kill your foe and return to the world for revenge.
In the game, you will play as the Yin-Yang Enforcer, wear the Divine Masks, and use the various items you collect to embark on a slaughter journey through the unpredictable netherworld. And each time you embark on the slaying journey, you will get closer to the truth behind this disaster.

Freely Efficiently Slaughter

  • Play as a Yin-Yang Enforcer, freely combine combos in a fully liberated action system to quickly move between enemies and experience almost non-stop continuous kills.

Rogue styles are randomly combined

  • You can collect 12+ Divine Masks, 5+ different main weapons, and 80+ secondary weapons and power-ups in the netherworld. Use them to cut down each enemy.

Have a rest, then living

  • Fishing, growing vegetables, cooking, freeing ordinary villagers and various NPCs in the gameplay, and running your ideal town.

Mortals against the divines

  • In the game, you can use the power of the Divine Mask to fight with demons and powerful Asura

Path of reincarnation full with dangerous

  • Walking through the netherworld to slay gods and demons, guide lonely souls to the underworld to reincarnate.Sacrifice will make you stronger, and as you improve your skills, each time you embark on a journey of rebirth will become more and more dangerous.
